adHeader: ALL SANTA CLARA CO, HOUSE CLEANING
adDetails: We have over 20 years of experience working in homes right here in the bay area! With plenty of references in any city, we are sure you will be satisfied with the way your home looks and feels after our cleaning crew attends to your home. Our prices are fair and we offer packages affordable for any household. We offer: * Weekly Services * Bi-weekly Services * Monthly Services * On Call Services * Special Projects (such as before parties, Graduations, Move-ins, Moving out) * Maid Service * Window Cleaning * Carpet and Upholstery Cleaning / BEST PRICES IN THE BAY AREA! We can offer crews ranging from 1 cleaner (personal service) to 3 cleaners for (large and fast cleaning jobs) 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED!!! We mean it, if you are unsatisfied with our work, we will come back and make sure you are satisfied! For your convenience, we also provide SAME DAY SERVICE / Call in by 12 pm and have your home clean by that afternoon! **********SPECIAL NEW CUSTOMERS*************** 1. 2 Bedrooms 1 Bathrooms or up to 900 sq/ft for $45, special 2. 3 Bedrooms 2 Bathrooms or up to 1200 sq/ft for $60, special 3. MOVING OUT SPECIAL, 2 House Cleaners x 1 hr for $65 FREE ESTIMATES GALAXY HOUSE CLEANING show contact info LICENSE, INSURED AND BOND Monday - Friday services / Weekend services available upon request show contact info
